title: Unchained Alister not able to get on YouTube subscription
body:
I have tried and tried to get the champ and skin, but have failed many times. I would like to get this for free sense it is saying that I could. If there is anything that Riot could do to help with this issue, then please do. I have been spending my time doing this and getting no results.
Thanks,
DarkGrowth27

replies.body: Their is also a skin for twitter and Facebook

Hiya! 

As ErgysMania, if you're unable to unlock the skin, please submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to take a look at your account and unlock the skin for you.
Just send a ticket to Riot support I had the same problem and the will add the skin and champion.
